metadata.Title: CVE-2018-0503 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Mediawiki 1.31 before 1.31.1, 1.30.1, 1.29.3 and 1.27.5 contains a flawwhere contrary to the documentation, $wgRateLimits entry for 'user'overrides that for 'newbie'.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0503` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.31.1-2
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.31.1-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.31.1-2').
